    • Method Detail

      • generateFlights

        public void generateFlights(int n)
        This function generates the specified number of flights randomly. It also calculates the positions of each of the pages.
        Parameters:
        n - The number of flights to be generated.

      • addFlight

        public void addFlight(model.Flight f)
        This function adds a flight to the linked list of flights.
        Parameters:
        f - The flight that is to be added to the flights list.

      • calculatePositions

        public void calculatePositions(int n)
        This calculates the positions of each of the pages. That is, the lower bound and upper bound of each of the pages.
        Parameters:
        n - The number of flights in the flights list.

      • getRandomFlight

        public model.Flight getRandomFlight()
        This function randomly generates a flight with the Random java function.
        Returns:
        The randomly generated flight.

      • bubbleSort

        public void bubbleSort(java.util.Comparator<model.Flight> c)
        This function uses a bubble sort algorithm to sort the flights list in the specified sorting criteria.
        Parameters:
        c - A comparator that determines the criteria in which the flights are going to be sorted.

      • selectionSort

        public void selectionSort(java.util.Comparator<model.Flight> c)
        This function uses a selection sort algorithm to sort the flights list in the specified sorting criteria.
        Parameters:
        c - A comparator that determines the criteria in which the flights are going to be sorted.

      • insertionSort

        public void insertionSort(java.util.Comparator<model.Flight> c)
        This function uses a insertion sort algorithm to sort the flights list in the specified sorting criteria.
        Parameters:
        c - A comparator that determines the criteria in which the flights are going to be sorted.

      • search

        public model.Flight search(int criteria,
                           java.lang.String value)
                    throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                           java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException,
                           java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException
        This function searches according to the criteria that arrives as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        criteria - The searching criteria.
        value - The value to be found.
        Returns:
        The flight that was found or null is it was not found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - If the value entered is not correct.
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the value entered is not correct.
        java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the value entered is not correct.

      • getPage

        public int getPage()
        This function obtains the current page of the airport terminal.
        Returns:
        The current page of the airport terminal.

        public void setPage(int page)
        This function changes the current page of the airport terminal.
        Parameters:
